text_block_list.text:
The day after the mock race in which Special Week came in 7th, 
she showed up again for training, but-

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant… All righ ty! Here I goooo!!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I'm not backing down either…!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah…!

During which-she made way for El Condor Pasa 
and Grass Wonder, who were catching up.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Wha, huh!?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan…?

Her sluggish- or rather, half-hearted run bewildered 
the two, who were running alongside…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Woah, woah, Spe-chan!! What's gotten into you!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
You were always so agile, tenacious, and 
gutsy!! Where did they all go!!?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: El-chan… E-Err… S-Sorry…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
…Sigh. I've had enough today!! Sorry, 
but allow me to call it a day.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I don't want to run with a Spe-chan who's in such a sorry state!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: E-El-chan…!!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Spe-chan… I'm sorry, I'll have to 
take my leave for today here too.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Grass-chan… U-Um, I'm sorry, I-!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Don't say sorry, Spe-chan. We never wanted you to blame yourself.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Still… it's perilous to run with your mind astray. 
A disturbed mind leads to a disturbed run, which 
may lead to unforeseen injuries.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Grass-chan…

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
There's no need to rush, okay, Spe-chan? Calm down, and come to 
terms with yourself. What do you say?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
…Besides, it seems the person with the strongest desire to aid 
you just so happens to be right here.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san…! Uuu, I… I…!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ( Chuckles ) Now if you'll ex cuse me~

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Alright… Thanks, Grass-chan.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …Trainer-san, I'm really sorry. I just couldn't run at all.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I think Grass-chan was on point… My mind really went astray…
choice_data_list: Was your friend's plea bothering you?
Was your friend's plea bothering you?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eh…? Trainer-san, you knew…?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: So you did… Sorry, that must've surprised you.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'm… surprised too, myself.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
It was my first time being surrounded by fellow 
horse girls and having peers… so this was also 
my first time getting yelled at by a friend.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
It was all so shocking. I could never have 
imagined… that it'd be this chilling.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …I've gotten weird since then.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Whenever I tried to pull ahead and win, I felt that feeling back 
then creeping back… I felt my body draining out of energy.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, what should I do…? 
Have I bec ome inept at running?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Am I going to be… a failure…?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Please, tell me… what I am supposed to do…!!
As Special Week crouched down, she broke down in tears.
Until she settled down, I stayed by her side watching over her…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …Sigh. I'm sorry, Trainer-san… I've settled down now.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
…It's already evening, huh. When I first got here, I thought 
the sunsets were pretty late here-

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Spe-chan! There you are… Oh, ah, uhh, I'm 
sorry, did I interrupt your moment?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, no, it's all good, Suzuka-san! What's the matter…?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
You see, your mother's letter arrived in today's post, so I 
thought I'd quickly bring it to you…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Spe-chan, you've always been looking forward to 
reading her letters, right? That's why…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka-san… T-Thank you so much for going out 
of your way just to deliver it to me…!

Silence Suzuka handed over the letter, and promptly went off. Was 
this her way of sho wing concern for her roommate…?
-Subsequently, Special Week slowly read through the letter.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (Chuckles)… She's saying the same thing again.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ah… yes. Mom always signs off her letters 
for me with the same message.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
"Spe, may you always be blessed with happiness." That's what my 
Moms always, and I mean always, say to me.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Both my birth mo ther… and my adoptive mother.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
…My birth mother passed away before I opened my eyes for the 
first time. I' ve only seen her face through pho tos.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
But my other mother, who was a dear friend of my birth mo ther, 
and took good care of me, always tell me,

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
that until my birth mother breathed her last, 
she always prayed for my happiness,

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
…Ehehe, incredible, right? That I have 2 mothers… Both of 
them are really wonderful mothers.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Really… wonderful…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …and yet, what am I even doing?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
…Trainer-san, please ex cuse me. I'm… 
going for a short run nearby.
…said Special Week, before proceeding to leave the spot.
